ygData.messageBody:
Hello,
THis is muaddib, and I put in a link to my new group i just started to get people to come to the group. this is my frist group. i hope this has not mada anyone mad, but it doesnt have anything to do with EverQuest. I may start a EverQuest group but not sure yet. if this have made you mad plz tell me and i will remove the link.
muaddib
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, September 20, 2003 8:14 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] General rule for posting links

Hey folks,
It just occurred to me that I haven't said much about the rules on posting
links.
Someone just reminded me of a rule I should have stipulated.
When you post a link to something, please have a description of what the
link is to (preferably mentioning EverQuest).
Just posting a link is something spammers do, so if you do post a link
without a description, people are likely to mistake it for spam.
I'm not picking on anyone or anything. It's my fault for not setting this
rule earlier. (well, not really a rule, but more of a request).
luv,
-Su ~List Owner~



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com


Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
